# Calculation - Bug BCG

Example of BCG decision rules for macroinvertebrate assemblages in high-gradient streams (riffle–run habitat) (Table 6 from Gerritsen et al. 2017). To see BCG rules for all nine BCG macroinvertebrate classes, see Gerritsen et al. 2012 [<a href="https://github.com/leppott/MNcalc/raw/main/inst/apps/MNcalc/www/links/BCG_BugRules_Gerritsen2012.pdf" target="blank">PDF</a>] and the output file ‘BCG_3metrules.’
